txt.en: Ever since the earliest records, history has been rife with stories of betrayal and tragedy. The rebellion of the Dourhands is just the latest chapter in this long and sorrowful litany. It is time to bring that chapter to an end....

The Dourhands had thought to overcome Durin's Folk, but at your hands they have suffered greatly for their presumption.\n\nPerhaps when this war has ended, those who remain can be reconciled -- but so long as the Enemy's influence remains, it seems that the battle will continue.
